entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @CyberpunkGame I'm dissapointed. If you are not confidence you're going to finished it by the deadline, don't annonuce the "release date". After all the "We will not delay anymore" or "Covid19 doesn't affect us", turn out it all bullshits. I'm going to cancel my pre-oder and w8 for the reviews.
